description: A utility for time offset, timezone conversion, and time difference calculation. Default timezone is UTC+8. Handles leap year February 29 correctly.

input.timezone: Integer, optional. Default is 8. Represents the timezone offset relative to UTC.
input.Y: Integer. Year offset, can be positive or negative.
input.M: Integer. Month offset, can be positive or negative.
input.D: Integer. Day offset, can be positive or negative.
input.h: Integer. Hour offset, can be positive or negative.
input.m: Integer. Minute offset, can be positive or negative.
input.s: Integer. Second offset, can be positive or negative.
input.baseTime: String, optional. Format: YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss. Serves as the reference time point.
input.targetTime: String, optional. Format: YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss. The target time point for comparison.

output.success: Boolean. True if successful, false if failed.
output.result: String. Current time or time difference. Only available when success is true.
output.resultType: String. Always 'time'. Only available when success is true.
output.value: Any type, optional. Additional data when failed.
